short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily shorten, manage, track and analyze your URLs directly from your browser with Shotcut.in. Best for optimizing link management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shotcut.in is a powerful URL management tool that allows you to easily shorten, manage, track, and analyze your URLs directly from your browser. Perfect for businesses, marketers, and anyone looking to optimize their link management. With Shotcut.in, you can use custom domains and aliases to create branded links. Stay organized by viewing your recently shortened links, and speed up your workflow with context menu integration for quickly shortening selected links. Whether you're optimizing campaigns or keeping track of your links, Shotcut.in makes URL management simple and efficient.
